Interface BackupOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PartitionAwareOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcquireBackupOperation, AddAllBackupOperation, AddBackupOperation, AwaitBackupOperation, BeforeAwaitBackupOperation, CacheBackupEntryProcessorOperation, CacheClearBackupOperation, CachePutAllBackupOperation, CachePutBackupOperation, CacheRemoveAllBackupOperation, CacheRemoveBackupOperation, ClearBackupOperation, ClearBackupOperation, ClearBackupOperation, CollectionAddAllBackupOperation, CollectionAddBackupOperation, CollectionClearBackupOperation, CollectionPrepareBackupOperation, CollectionRemoveBackupOperation, CollectionRollbackBackupOperation, CollectionTxnAddBackupOperation, CollectionTxnRemoveBackupOperation, CompareAndRemoveBackupOperation, CountDownLatchBackupOperation, DeadMemberBackupOperation, DrainBackupOperation, DrainBackupOperation, EntryBackupOperation, EvictAllBackupOperation, InitBackupOperation, ListSetBackupOperation, LockBackupOperation, MultipleEntryBackupOperation, OfferBackupOperation, PartitionWideEntryBackupOperation, PartitionWideEntryWithPredicateBackupOperation, PollBackupOperation, PutAllBackupOperation, PutBackupOperation, PutBackupOperation, PutFromLoadAllBackupOperation, ReduceBackupOperation, ReleaseBackupOperation, RemoveAllBackupOperation, RemoveBackupOperation, RemoveBackupOperation, RemoveBackupOperation, ReplicaSyncResponse, ReplicaSyncRetryResponse, SemaphoreBackupOperation, SetBackupOperation, SetBackupOperation, SignalBackupOperation, TxnCommitBackupOperation, TxnOfferBackupOperation, TxnPrepareBackupOperation, TxnPrepareBackupOperation, TxnPrepareBackupOperation, TxnReserveOfferBackupOperation, TxnReservePollBackupOperation, TxnRollbackBackupOperation, TxnRollbackBackupOperation, TxnRollbackBackupOperation, TxnUnlockBackupOperation, UnlockBackupOperation

    public interface BackupOperation
extends PartitionAwareOperation
    When an BackupAwareOperation makes a change, the backups need to be replicated to other members (depending on the configuration and if change really happened). The BackupOperation is created by such a operation.
    Author:
    mdogan 12/3/12
